body:
`x/tools/cmd/gotype` now uses `go/types`. I guess it means that it is no longer deprecated ;)

`src/go/types/gotype.go` file is identical to `x/tools/cmd/gotype/gotype.go` + `x/tools/cmd/gotype/doc.go` except docs in x being slightly more accurate. I suggest to delete it and close this issue.
